compatibility.notes: NPOSL-3.0 allows for linking with other licenses but requires that modifications to the NPOSL-3.0 licensed code remain under the same license. Care should be taken when combining with strong copyleft licenses.

key_requirements: Include the license text with any distribution of the Original Work or Derivative Works.
Include a copyright notice with the Original Work.
State any changes made to the Original Work when distributing Derivative Works.
license.name: NPOSL-3.0
obligations: Distribute copies of the Original Work and Derivative Works under the same Non-Profit Open Software License.
Provide a machine-readable copy of the Source Code along with each copy of the Original Work.
Obtain express prior permission from the Licensor to use their trademarks or service marks for endorsement or promotion.
